movies.title: Pelle Politibil går i vannet
movies.plot: A fallen electrical cable zaps Radar the Police Car and grants him special powers, but his new found energy brings new found responsibilities. Radar now has what it takes to stand up to the Badger Brothers; a shady duo plotting to steal and bottle the town's water supply. With the help of his friend, Dottie the Otter, Radar must defeat the criminals to save the town - and the environment!
movies.simplePlot: A fallen electrical cable zaps Radar the Police Car and grants him special powers, but his new found energy brings new found responsibilities. Radar now has what it takes to stand up to the...

biography.bio: Robert Stoltenberg was born on April 17, 1965 in Norway. He is an actor and writer, known for Trollhunter (2010), Borettslaget (2002) and Pelle Politibil går i vannet (2009).
biography.name: Robert Stoltenberg

biography.bio: Pernille Sørensen is an actress and writer, known for Nytt på nytt (1999), Knerten (2009) and Brille (2012).
biography.name: Pernille Sørensen

biography.bio: Gard B. Eidsvold was born on May 7, 1966. He is an actor, known for Un chic type (2010), Zero Kelvin (1995) and Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003).
biography.name: Gard B. Eidsvold

biography.bio: Fredrik Steen is an actor and director, known for O'Horten (2007), Pelle Politibil går i vannet (2009) and Kurt Turns Evil (2008).
biography.name: Fredrik Steen

biography.bio: Bjørn Sundquist was born on June 16, 1948 in Hammerfest, Norway as Bjørn Richard Sundquist. He is an actor, known for Hansel & Gretel: Witch Hunters (2013), Dead Snow (2009) and Ragnarok (2013).
biography.name: Bjørn Sundquist

biography.bio: Anthony Lawson was born on August 26, 1978 in High Point, North Carolina, USA as Anthony David Lawson. He is known for his work on Girl Powered (2007), Agent F.O.X. (2014) and Pelle Politibil går i vannet (2009).
biography.name: Anthony Lawson

biography.bio: Marc Matney is an actor and producer, known for Tape to Play (2011), The Dark Power (1985) and Bubblegum Crisis (1987). He was previously married to René Lemons.
biography.name: Marc Matney

biography.placeOfBirth: New Hanover County, North Carolina, USA
biography.bio: Shannon Settlemyre was born on June 4, 1979 in New Hanover County, North Carolina, USA as Shannon Nicole Brown. She is a director and actress, known for Urusei Yatsura: Only You (1983), Urusei Yatsura 4: Lum the Forever (1986) and Urusei Yatsura 6: Itsudatte, mai dârin (1991).
biography.name: Shannon Settlemyre

biography.bio: Ashley Thrill is an actress, known for Pelle Politibil går i vannet (2009), Magical Twilight (1994) and Destined for Love (2009).
biography.name: Ashley Thrill

biography.bio: Michael Yeager is an actor, known for Agent F.O.X. (2014), Pelle Politibil går i vannet (2009) and Pelle Politibil på sporet (2013).
biography.name: Michael Yeager
